thread.title: Michael Moore's Temper Tantrum at Women's March
thread.title_full: Michael Moore's Temper Tantrum at Women's March

author: Cortney O'Brien
title: Michael Moore's Temper Tantrum at Women's March
text:
Michael Moore's Temper Tantrum at Women's March Share Share Tweet 
Filmmaker Michael Moore is refusing to accept the fact that Donald Trump is now president, despite his predicting this outcome last year. At the anti-Trump Women's March on Washington on Saturday, which has reportedly drawn hundreds of thousands of attendees, Moore told the crowd that Trump's electoral win gave him little mandate pursue his policies. Holding up a Washington Post headline which read, "Trump Takes Power," Moore shook his head and said it is the marchers who hold the real power - the "majority." 
To really drive his point home, Moore tore the newspaper in two. At Women's March on Washington, Michael Moore rips up front page on Pres. Trump's inauguration https://t.co/MIVYbJqJrQ pic.twitter.com/9Zk9ROLU4J â€” ABC News (@ABC) January 21, 2017 
Mature.
